RT @jess 👑 @AOC brilliantly summarized two important ways to fix the pay gap: 
1. No asking for salary history. 
2. Allow salary info to be shared at work. 
And for Silicon Valley folks: make sure you audit equity as well. https://twitter.com/abc/status/1091057769409597440 QT @ABC Rep. People at a federal prison in Brooklyn are enduring unbearable, freezing conditions after going without heat and power for days — this is outrageous and inhumane. Gov. Northam should resign. Lt. Gov. Justin Fairfax should step in and begin a new day for Virginia.

So basically Maduro’s idea is that he gets to serve a full term as the  illegitimate President, but the legitimate & democratically elected National Assembly has early elections? And in a country where Maduro controls the media & his loyalists get to count the votes? https://twitter.com/reutersvzla/status/1091861509658103808 QT @ReutersVzla As Venezuelans protest, struggling @NicolasMaduro seeks early parliament vote | By @AnaIsa_Martinez and @AABerwick https://www.reuters.com/article/us-venezuela-politics-idUSKCN1PR03H

The photo is racist and contrary to fundamental American values. I join my colleagues in Virginia calling on Governor Northam to do the right thing so that the people of the Commonwealth of Virginia can heal and move forward.

Every other major country has made the morally principled and financially responsible decision to make health care a right to all of their people. Those who say this goal is unachievable are selling the American people short.

.@USEmbassyTurkey we really don’t need any new irritants right now in this already complicated moment in our bilateral relationship. 

I respectfully request you recommend that #Turkey stop helping #Maduro steal the gold reserves of #Venezuela.

RT @brithume I wonder if the editors at the Washington Post have any idea that such headlines have been an object of ridicule for years among conservatives. The focus, as always, is never the behavior of the left, only the reaction to it on the right. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DyVORB9W0AA-biR.jpg

Northam must resign, and those who try to help him stumble past this deserve scrutiny.

If you can’t understand how painful + eroding this is to American society, let alone the state of Virginia, take some time to read up this weekend.

To start, try “Between the World and Me.” https://twitter.com/maragay/status/1091739023117307904 QT @MaraGay Pro-tip: if you can’t recall whether you ever dressed up in blackface or wore Klan robes, please do America a favor and stay out of public office. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/02/02/us/politics/ralph-northam-virginia-governor.html

During Chicago’s historic cold freeze, Candice Payne’s act of kindness spurred others to take action and save lives.

Watch as #Venezuela National Police steps aside & refuses to repress marchers. Watch as at least one office hugs one of the marchers. 

This is why Maduro is using those death squads. The police, national guard & military rank & file will not attack their families & neighbors. https://twitter.com/elpitazotv/status/1091718650824933377 QT @ElPitazoTV #Lara | Cerca de las 10:00 am funcionarios de la PNB destacados en la avenida Venezuela con calle 22, en Barquisimeto, se retiraron de la concentración que convocó la oposición venezolana y abrazaron a los presentes #2Feb -vía @LizGascon Vídeo Rafael Parra http://elpitazo.net/ http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1091717717856522243/pu/img/XkOYfaU8MnGav1ym.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1091717717856522243/pu/vid/320x400/vH6h6JrmVQM_VRco.mp4?tag=6

High ranking #Venezuela Air Force General via this video has announced that he has submitted himself to the legitimate civilian authority of Interim President @jguaido & awaits his instructions. 

AT LEAST 7 other high ranking officers want to do the same but are still in fear. https://twitter.com/carlaangola/status/1091702484966563840 QT @carlaangola Hace apenas minutos conversé con él por teléfono. Me dijo que como militar institucional se acaba de subordinar al poder civil legítimo en Vzla y que solo cumplirá las órdenes de su Comandante en Jefe @jguaido En este momento espera sus instrucciones para poder dar nuevos pasos. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1091702377407758336/pu/img/T3Td8fFiszfRFuX5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1091702377407758336/pu/vid/320x400/nlbyUu7jmZEnkRxc.mp4?tag=6

RT @JamilSmith Northam refused to grasp that blackface is dehumanization. Wearing us like costumes makes it easier to render us homeless. Easier to take away our ballots. Easier to silence our voices in the public square. To miseducate us. To let us die in hospitals. To kill us with impunity.

Absolutely haunting. Incarcerated individuals at a federal detention center in Brooklyn are pounding on their windows trying to get people's attention while they're suffering in the cold. We need answers.
